title: Bonus Action
description: You can take a Bonus Action only when a special ability, a spell, or another feature of the game states that you can do something as a Bonus Action.

contents.name: Potion of Healing
contents.summary: You can drink or administer a potion of healing to another creature within 5 feet of yourself. The creature that drinks the potion regains 2d4 + 2 Hit Points.
